errors.error_description: The file path for the login screenshot is incorrect (`docs/images/rd-login.png`), causing the image not to display. The correct directory is `img`.
correction_candidates: Change the image path from `docs/images/rd-login.png` to `docs/img/rd-login.png`.
Change the image path from `docs/images/rd-login.png` to `../docs/img/rd-login.png`.
Change the image path from `docs/images/rd-login.png` to `/docs/img/rd-login.png`.
Move the image file to the `docs/images/` directory to match the path.
errors.golden_answer: Change the image path from `docs/images/rd-login.png` to `docs/img/rd-login.png`.
